Instance.description: Structure containing a preset CustomSchedule for shipped Custom Schedule Venues.

TunableList.name: assignment_hierarchy
TunableList.description: The order of this list dicates the order that roles are displayed AND the order with which we attempt to automatically place the active household sim into based on assignment criteria.

TunableList.name: preselected_getaway_challenges
TunableList.description: A list of all challenges automatically applied to a Premade Getaway.

TunableTuple.description: A challenge paired with CustomScheduleAssignment(s) deemed 'of_interest' and 'participating'.

TunableList.name: assigned_groups
TunableList.description: This mirrors 'GetawayChallenge' groups. Assign each CustomScheduleAssignment to the group index you expect the assignment to auto-fill into.

Tunable.description: A CustomScheduleAssignment that auto-fills into this index's group within the Getaway Challenge.

Tunable.name: challenge
Tunable.description: The Getaway Challenge to be automatically applied when scheduling a getaway with this schedule.

TunableList.name: time_slots
TunableList.description: A tunable mapping from hour offset of the start of a day that will be applied at that hour every day.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The range of hours in a day.

Tunable.name: default_behavior
Tunable.description: The default ClubInteractionGroup used for this time slot if a Time Slot Assignment's interactions are unavailable.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The pre-made CustomScheduleAssignment used for this time slot assignment.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Data for a given 'Assignment' during a given time slot.

TunableVariant.name: behavior_overrides
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will override the 'default behaviors' tuned on the associated CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableList.name: enabled
TunableList.description: ClubInteractionGroups to use instead of the CustomScheduleAssignment's 'default behaviors'.

TunableVariant.name: outfit_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will override the 'default outfit' tuned on the associated CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableTuple.name: no_outfit
TunableTuple.description: If selected, the CustomScheduleAssignment will not make any changes to the default outfit for the assignment.

TunableTuple.name: outfit_category
TunableTuple.description: If selected, the CustomScheduleAssignment will force an outfit category. If the assignment's default outfit setting is 'Uniform', it will use the uniform's outfit category.

TunableTuple.name: style_and_color
TunableTuple.description: If selected, the CustomScheduleAssignment will force a generated outfit based on tuned Style and Color tags.

TunableVariant.name: color
TunableVariant.description: The desired color tag for the outfit.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: A color tag used to find matching CAS parts.

TunableVariant.name: style
TunableVariant.description: The desired style tag for the outfit.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: A style tag used to find matching CAS parts.

TunableVariant.name: sim_count_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will override the 'sim count' tuned on the associated CustomScheduleAssignment.
